FacilityName: SSI Technologies, Inc. Sintered Specialties Div.

Monthly Safety Meetings.



Five-Year Accident History:



There have been no accidents or injuries related to the PSM/RMP covered hydrogen process during the past five years.



Emergency Response Program:



The facility emergency action plans have been developed in accordance with OSHA 1910.38. The plans address fire, explosions, spills or releases of hazardous substances, severe weather, and other criteria. The plan details response actions by facility personnel for such emergencies, safety and emergency equipment, communication responsibilities, and coordination with off-site responders, as well as notification of federal and state agencies. The plans include procedures addressing incidents involving hydrogen.



Planned Changes to Improve Safety:



The facility is continually working to improve safety in all areas, as well as within the hydrogen process. The facility encourages input from operation and maintenance personnel, as well as vendor and agency inspectors, and responds to address potential improvements. The facility places a high emphasis upon training of personnel in the areas of safety and environmental awareness, compliance, and response.
